definition.datasource:
from nxstools.pyeval import limaccd ds.result = limaccd.postrun(commonblock, ds.$(name)_saving_next_number, ds.$(name)_saving_directory, ds.$(name)_saving_suffix, ds.$(name)_acq_nb_frames, ds.$(name)_saving_index_format, ds.$(name)_saving_prefix, "$(name)_saving_next_number", "$(name)", ds.$(name)_saving_format, ds.$(name)_saving_frame_per_file, ds.$(name)_image_height, ds.$(name)_image_width, ds.$(name)_image_type, ds.$(name)_acq_trigger_mode, ds.$(name)_acq_mode, "$var.filename", "$var.entryname#'$(__entryname__)'$var.serialno", "$(__insname__)", "$var.acq_modes")
$datasources.$(name)_saving_next_number $datasources.$(name)_saving_directory $datasources.$(name)_saving_suffix $datasources.$(name)_acq_nb_frames $datasources.$(name)_saving_index_format $datasources.$(name)_saving_prefix $datasources.$(name)_saving_format $datasources.$(name)_saving_frame_per_file $datasources.$(name)_image_height $datasources.$(name)_image_width $datasources.$(name)_image_type $datasources.$(name)_acq_trigger_mode $datasources.$(name)_acq_mode
